decision_conditions: The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satify the requirements of Condition 8 (Construction Logistics Plan). Therefore, the proposal would fail to demonstrate that the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers, highway safety and the free flow of traffic would be safeguarded in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 5 (Cycle Storage) details. Therefore, fails to ensure the provision of satisfactory cycle storage facilities and in the interests of highway safety in accordance with Policy DM8 (Sustainable Transport for New Developments) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The details submitted in relation to Condition 7 (Conservation of Energy and Water) are considered unacceptable. Therefore, falling outisde the interests of sustainability and energy conservation in accordance with Policies 5.2 (Minimising Carbon Dioxide Emissions) and 5.3 (Sustainable Design & Construction) of the London Plan (July 2011) and Policy DM1(Sustainable Design and Construction Standards) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant has submitted insufficient and inappropriate information to satisfy the requirements of Condition 6 (Refuse Facilities). Therefore, fails to ensure the provision of refuse facilities to the satisfaction of the Council in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
description: Details required for 5 (Cycle Storage), 6 (Refuse Facilities) 7 (Conservation of Energy and Water) and 8 (Construction Logistics Plan) of planning application 19/01892/FUL (Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning application reference: 18/12205/FUL for the 'Erection of single storey side and rear extension, first floor side extension, hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions to facilitate conversion of existing dwellinghouse to create 1 x 2 bed and 1 x 3 bed self-contained unit to include increased depth of rear extension, additional extension to the side of the dwelling, alterations to approved roof configuration and removal of chimney stack.)
